name: 700th Anniversary of the Founding of Bern
obverse: Helmeted and armored bust of Berthold V von Zähringen facing left with hist coat of arms below.
obverse_inscriptions: * BERCHTOLD · V, HERZOG VON ZAEHRINGEN, RECTOR VON BURGUND *
reverse: Coat of arms within a wreath.
reverse_inscriptions: * ZUR FEIER DES 700 JAEHRIGEN BESTEHENS DER STADT BERN *
description: The city of Bern was founded in 1191 by Berthold V, Duke of Zähringen.
